dialogue.htmlContent:
Adjoining the main atrium of the Gambling Den, you spot an open-fronted shop, with the sign 'Roxy's Fun Box' fixed to the wall above the opening. From your exterior vantage point, you can see that the interior is filled with rows of shelves, holding all manner of different goods, but despite quite obviously being open for business, the shop floor looks to be completely deserted.

You could [pc.step] inside and take a look around, or instead head back into the Gambling Den...

Once again deciding to enter Roxy's store, you scan the interior for any sign of the crass owner or her latest rat-boy acquisition. Before you see them, however, you're alerted to their presence by the unmistakable sound of Roxy's grating laughter coming from the other side of the shop. Approaching the source of the noise, you suddenly see the rat-girl stand up from behind her counter, puffing away on a cigarette. Grinning down at who you assume must be Vengar, she teases, [roxy.speech(That's right, keep on lickin' yer lips! Ya ain't gonna be gettin' any more o' me cunt juices until yer willin' ta do exactly what I say! I'll make ya regret ever fuckin' those sluts!)]

Suddenly noticing your approach out of the corner of her eye, Roxy turns towards you with an angry snarl on her face. Upon recognising you, however, her scowl shifts into a devious grin. Leaning heavily on the counter-top, she takes a deep drag of her cigarette and teases, [roxy.speech(If yer back ta get another taste o' me cunt, ya know ya gotta pay a thousand flames. Me little slave 'ere 'as already got me cunt all wet an' drippin' from excitement. Ya ain't gonna resist gettin' a taste o' me flowin' juices now, are ya?)]

Suddenly noticing your approach out of the corner of her eye, Roxy turns towards you with an angry snarl on her face. Upon recognising you, however, her scowl shifts into a devious grin. Leaning heavily on the counter-top, she takes a deep drag of her cigarette and teases, [roxy.speech(If yer back ta get another taste o' me cunt, ya know ya gotta pay a thousand flames! Ya ain't gonna resist gettin' a taste o' me flowin' juices now, are ya?)]

Having rid yourself of your addiction to Roxy's girlcum, you tell the rat-girl that you have absolutely no interest in paying any money to eat her out. Raising one eyebrow, the foul-mouther rat-girl jeers, [roxy.speech(Oh, you's fuckin' gone an' cured yeself, 'ave ya? Well, 'ow about I offer ya the chance to earn an item by eatin' me out again? Come on, ya know yer cravin' a taste o' me wet little cunt again, ain't ya?! Me little slave 'ere sure seems ta love it! Heh-heh-heh!)]

Suddenly noticing your approach out of the corner of her eye, Roxy turns towards you with an angry snarl on her face. Upon recognising you, however, her scowl shifts into a devious grin. Leaning heavily on the counter-top, she takes a deep drag of her cigarette and teases, [roxy.speech(If yer here lookin' fer some hot little rat pussy ta get a taste of, me little slave 'ere 'as already got me cunt all wet an' drippin' from excitement. Ya ain't gonna resist gettin' a taste o' me flowin' juices now, are ya? Remember, ya get a free item from me shop as an extra reward!)]

Before you can reply, Roxy's 'little slave' stands up from behind the counter, and is, of course, the familiar figure of Vengar. Steadying himself against the counter with one hand, he doesn't notice who you are at first as he angrily addresses Roxy, [vengar.speech(I ain't ya slave, bitch! You ain't gonna get away with thi-)]

[roxy.speech(You want me ta fuckin' gag ya?!)] Roxy screeches, before turning to slap Vengar across the face. Before he can react, she grabs the ring on the front of the rat-boy's slave collar and yanks downwards, forcing him to his knees. Glaring down at her insolent ex-boyfriend, she continues, [roxy.speech(That fuckin' lizard said I can do whatever I want with ya, includin' transformin' ya, so if ya don't wanna be turned into a sissy rat-slut, ya betta never even think about talkin' back ta me! Ain't that right, [pc.name]?)]

Having been present at the moment when Axel gave Roxy permission to transform Vengar, you confirm that what she's saying is the truth. Recognising your voice, Vengar peers over the top of the counter, before exclaiming, [vengar.speechNoEffects(You?! Dis is all your faul-)]

Having a habit of interrupting people, Roxy once again cuts Vengar off by roughly shoving him to the ground. Raising her paw, she steps on his face, snarling, [roxy.speech(Shut yer fuckin' mouth! Yer ain't gonna speak ta me customers without me express permission, ya understand, slave?!)]

After hearing a muffled groan of agreement, the rat-girl turns back towards you, cigarette still in mouth, and asks, [roxy.speech(So, wot ya wantin' this time?)]

Wanting to investigate further, you [pc.step] forwards into the empty store, before starting to look around for any sign of the owner, 'Roxy'. The first thing that strikes you as you enter is the fact that the interior smells strongly of cigarette smoke; a clear indication that the currently-absent owner must be a very heavy smoker indeed. Although there's a counter prominently running along half the length of the far wall, you can't see anyone standing behind it, and, recalling Axel's warning that you should watch yourself around Roxy, you carefully start walking up and down the aisles, on the lookout for any sign of trouble.

As you're taking a look at some of the goods on offer, you suddenly hear movement coming from behind the shop's counter, and, turning to face it, you see a rather scruffy-looking rat-girl standing up, before yawning and stretching her arms up above her head. The very next thing she does after waking from her nap is grab a cigarette from under the counter, before putting it in her mouth and inhaling a lungful of smoke.

Using this opportunity to take a good look at the rat-girl, the first thing you notice about her is the series of claw-shaped scars running down over one side of her face. A black eye patch conceals whatever damage this old wound has done to her eye, which gives her a rather ominous appearance. The second thing you notice about this brown-furred rat-girl is the fact that she's wearing an abundance of gold jewellery, with every possible piercing that you can imagine being home to some form of gaudy ornament or another.

As she catches sight of you with her good eye, the rat-girl sneers, before unleashing one of the most profane greetings you've ever heard, [roxy.speech(Heh, someone's finally fuckin' come to buy some o' my shit. Well, that'd fuckin' better be what yer here for. The last cunt that came in here just fuckin' stood around like some gormless twat, an' I had to fuckin' scream at 'im to get 'im to fuck off. You don't look like a complete fuckin' idiot, so I'm hopin' yer gonna buy somethin', an' not waste my fuckin' time.)]

At this point, the foul-mouthed rat-girl smirks at you, before inhaling deeply on her cigarette once again. Blowing out a huge cloud of white smoke, she lets a cackling, grating laughter burst out from between her lips. Placing both of her hands on the counter in front of her, she leans forwards and, cigarette hanging from her mouth, continues, [roxy.speech(The name's Roxy. You got a problem with any o' my prices, or what I've got fer sale, you fuckin' keep it to yerself, ya got me?)]

[pc.speech(Right...)] you say, taken a little off-guard by just how crass Roxy is. [pc.speech(I'm [pc.name].)]

[roxy.speech(Heh. You ain't like most of the cunts that wander in 'ere. I can tell there's somethin' real special about yer,)] Roxy grins, before beckoning you closer with one hand. Deciding to follow along for now, you step towards the counter, allowing her to continue, [roxy.speech(I don't offer this to any ol' cunt what wanders in here, but I got a real fuckin' special deal fer you. Not gonna give yer the whole story, cos I ain't got time fer that shit, but a couple o' years ago I used to wander 'round that shithole they call Dominion, an' I came across this real fuckin' hung horse-boy runnin' a shop up there. Well, he showed me his cock, fuckin' huge it was, an' said he'd sell me his stuff real cheap if I'd blow 'im right then and there. Well, there ain't no way I was sayin' no to that!)] Roxy bursts out laughing yet again; the sudden, grating noise causes you to flinch. Inhaling on her cigarette, Roxy carelessly blows the smoke all over you as she continues with her story, [roxy.speech(So anyways, I'd keep on goin' back to suck his fuckin' huge cock and get a real good price on the shit he was sellin'. Anyways, the whole point o' this story is that it gave me an idea, y'see?)]

Roxy pauses for a moment, and, hoping that she's finally getting to the point, you ask, [pc.speech(What idea was that?)]

[roxy.speech(Ay! Don't fuckin' interrupt!)] she berates you, before once again bursting out in her abrasive laughter. Before you can react to her rude reply, she continues, [roxy.speech(Now that I've got my own shop and shit, I was thinkin' I'd do the same as that fuckin' horse-boy, but make it even better! Instead of just givin' yer some kinda shitty discount, if yer wanna come lick my cunt 'til I cum, I'll give yer a fuckin' free item from my shop!)]

[pc.speech(What kind of free item?)] you ask, immediately regretting asking your question, as it causes Roxy to let out yet another of her infuriatingly annoying laughs.

[roxy.speech(I got a couple o' dice here. Yer come down here and let me plant my fuckin' sweet cunt on yer face, and I'll roll these to decide on a random fuckin' item from my shop. Whattya say?)]

As you look down at the sudden movement, she reaches down with her free hand to spread her exposed pussy, blowing out yet another cloud of smoke as she teases you, [roxy.speech(Come on, I can tell yer want a taste o' my fuckin' cunt! All yer gotta do is get yer fuckin' tongue buried in here an' get me ta cum. Easiest item you'll ever earn!)]

Just a moment later, she sees you entering her shop, and calls out, [roxy.speech(Hey [pc.name]! Yer back to buy some o' this shit I got on offer?)]

[pc.speech(Hi, Roxy,)] you reply, [pc.speech(I just wanted to see what you've got in stock.)]

[roxy.speech(Well, seein' as it's you, I don't mind yer takin' a look around fer a bit. Oh, and remember, if yer want a free item, my special offer's still on!)] Roxy says, before bursting out in her abrasive laughter.
